content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
This PlayStation®VR demo sampler includes demos of gaming content spanning across a wide variety of diverse genres.

Here’s what you get:
• Battlezone (Rebellion)
• Dino Frontier* (Uber Entertainment)
• Eve: Valkyrie (CCP Games)
• Fantastic Contraption* (Radial Games)
• Job Simulator* (Owlchemy Labs)
• Moss (Polyarc)
• Raw Data* (Survios)
• Rez Infinite (Enhance Games)
• Star Child (GameTrust)
• The Persistence (Firesprite)
• Thumper (Drool)
• Tiny Trax (FuturLab)

Available via download
• StarBlood Arena (Whitemoon Dreams)

*PS Move Controllers required to play these demos

PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required

PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required
Enhanced play with 2 PS Move controllers

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
